name: Bilingual Samoan Parenting Class
description: This family program explores the dynamic interactions within a traditional Samoan family, offering insights into cultural values and practices. The parenting class is guided by the APIPES 8-week parenting curriculum, with a focus on recognizing both Samoan and American cultural influences and their impact on the lives of youth and families as a whole.

howToGetIt: Call mainline or send email for more information.
